text: Robert Abrams (born July 4, 1938) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the Attorney General of New York from 1979 to 1993 and the Democratic nominee for the U.S. Senate election in New York in 1992. He was the Borough president of The Bronx from 1970 to 1978. ==References== ==Other websites== * Political Graveyard * Robert Abrams - Partner: Stroock & Stroock & Lavan LLP Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Bronx borough presidents Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Columbia University alumni Category:New York State attorneys general
title: Robert Abrams
